      • makeCalendarFromUserInput

        public static java.util.Calendar makeCalendarFromUserInput(java.lang.String date,
                                                           java.lang.String time)
        Gets input from user (date & time) to, create a Calendar object

        Can set calendar with just the day (initCal = null, requestHour = false)
        Or the day & the time (initCal = null, requestHour = true)
        Or add a time to an existing calendar object (initCal = Calendar, requestHour = true)

        Parameters:
        initCal - (reference type: Calendar) initial Calendar object, can be null
        requestHour - (primitive type: boolean) determines whether to ask the user for a time
        Returns:
        the Calendar object created from user input (reference type: Calendar)
        Throws:
        BadRoomBookingException - with try-catch block of ParseException, to check for bad date input (invalid date or invalid characters)

      • makeCalendarFromUserInput

        public static java.util.Calendar makeCalendarFromUserInput(java.lang.String date,
                                                           javax.swing.JTextField time)

      • processTimeString

        public static int processTimeString(java.lang.String t)
        Converts user input hour from a string to an int, to be added to a Calendar object.

        Acceptable string hour formats: 1 pm ; 1 p.m. ; 13:00

        Parameters:
        t - (reference type: String) the string based time to be converted
        Returns:
        hour (primitive type: int) to be added to a calendar object

      • processTimeString

        public static int processTimeString(javax.swing.JTextField t1)

      • findBooking

        public RoomBooking findBooking(java.util.Calendar cal)
        Searches roomBookings ArrayList for any booking that matches (or overlaps) a specific day and time

        Uses binarySearch() method to search for the matching date/time of a RoomBooking's timeBlock object,
        and returns its index if found, or null if no matching timeBlock was found

        Parameters:
        cal - (reference type: Calendar) the day & time to search for
        Returns:
        the roomBooking that matches the search parameter, or null (reference type: RoomBooking)

      • saveRoomBooking

        public boolean saveRoomBooking(RoomBooking roomBooking)
        Saves room booking data to the RoomBookings ArrayList

        Searches through existing RoomBooking TimeBlocks to see if the new
        entry's TimeBlock overlaps any, and returns false if an conflict is found.
        If there's no conflict, it adds the new RoomBooking to the ArrayList, sorts the list, and returns true.

        Parameters:
        roomBooking - (reference type: RoomBooking) the RoomBooking object to save
        Returns:
        the result of the save process (primitive type: boolean; true = success, false = fail)

      • deleteBooking

        public boolean deleteBooking(RoomBooking rb)
        Deletes a RoomBooking from the RoomBookings list

        Displays the existing booking data for the date & time requested,
        and asks for confirmation to delete that entry (if it exists).

        Parameters:
        cal - (reference type: Calendar) the day & time for the entry to be deleted
        Returns:
        the result of the deletion (true = success, false = fail)

      • changeBooking

        public boolean changeBooking(RoomBooking oldRB,
                             RoomBooking newRB)
        Alters an existing RoomBooking

        Searches for a matching booking at the date & time specified by cal, and requests a new start & end time for it from the user.
        Checks that the new time doesn't overlap any existing bookings.
        Sorts the list after the time is updated.

        Parameters:
        cal - (reference type: Calendar) containing the day and time of the booking to altered
        Returns:
        the result of finding & saving the booking (true = success, false = fail)

      • displayDayBookings

        public java.lang.String displayDayBookings(java.util.Calendar cal)
        Displays all the RoomBookings for a selected day

        Takes a calendar inputed by the user and uses just the date to find all bookings on that day
        For each hour it searches for any bookings in that hour using binarySearch() method
        If an entry is found it's toString() method is called to display its data to the user, and for loop skips to end hour of the found booking
        Or it displays that no booking was found for that hour
        Each entry is output in chronological order for that date.

        Parameters:
        cal - (reference type: calendar) containing the date to be displayed

      • saveBookingsToFile

        public boolean saveBookingsToFile()
        Saves the roomBookings arrayList into a file.

        ArrayList roomBookings is saved as an Object Stream into CurrentRoomBookings.book

        Returns:
        the result of save process (true = success, false = fail)

      • loadBookingsFromFile

        public java.util.ArrayList<RoomBooking> loadBookingsFromFile()
        Loads the contents of a file into a RoomBooking arrayList and returns it.

        It expects data to be stored as an ObjectStrem CurrentRoomBookings.book
        Returns null for any file IO type exceptions.

        Returns:
        the RoomBooking ArrayList loaded from the file, or null

      • getRoomBookings

        public java.util.ArrayList<RoomBooking> getRoomBookings()

      • errorOnBlank

        public static boolean errorOnBlank(java.lang.String string,
                                   javax.swing.JTextField jf)
        Checks strings to determine if they're blank.

        Throws a BadRoomBookingException for empty strings, returns false otherwise.
        Used to verify all user input (except Organization)

        Parameters:
        string - to be checked for being empty
        Returns:
        false
        Throws:
        BadRoomBookingException - if the content of the string is an empty string

      • errorOnNull

        public static <T> boolean errorOnNull(T obj,
                                      javax.swing.JTextField jf)
        Checks objects to determine if they're null

        If the generic object <T> type is null, it throws a BadRoomBookingException Otherwise, it returns false.
        Used in every setter method and for verifying user text input.

        Type Parameters:
        T - for generic object type method
        Parameters:
        obj - - generic type T, to be checked for null value
        Returns:
        false, if there is no null, throws an error otherwise
        Throws:
        BadRoomBookingException - if the passed obj is null
